New Records: Shohei Ohtani hit a three-run home run, Max Muncy tied the franchise record with his 13th career postseason homer
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani's three-run home run in the eighth inning, the Dodgers' fourth playoff shutout in five games
Post-Match Reflections: Walker Buehler commented on his pitching performance and the team's ability to secure a shutout
Miscellaneous Highlights: Luis Severino struggled with fielding errors, the game's significance in the best-of-seven series
